page.title: 12ASPULL CHURCH SCHOOL (cont)
page.content: reception class play area and shop. There is an infant block, a junior block, an administration block and a hall block which has the schools own kitchen in it. In 1985 there are six classes in our school although there areseven class bases. The one that is not used for a class is a television and music room. In each teaching block there is a resource area which is a shared working area. Our school is very attractive and everybody likes it when they visit. It is light , bright and colourful.
